name: Who's Behind That...? S2
description:
Enter this speed-dating show and meet 13 different contestants. But...you can only see half of their faces! Talk to them within a short amount of time and find out who clicks with you! After you make your final pick, you'll be able to see their entire face!

(Playing Season 1 is not required for you to enjoy this game.)

-3500 Words

-13 OCs submitted by 13 different people

(If your OC isn't included, I apologize. There were a lot of submissions and I couldn't include all. Even now, I tried my best to add as many as I could. I hope you understand. There'll always be a next time!)

Special thanks to everyone who submitted their OCs:
